    • Method Detail

      • rlpDecodeNextItem

        public static RLPObject rlpDecodeNextItem(java.nio.ByteBuffer bb)
        Read RLP data from a Byte Buffer.
        Parameters:
        bb - ByteBuffer from which to read the RLP data
        Returns:
        RLPObject (e.g. RLPElement or RLPList) containing RLP data

      • detectRLPObjectType

        public static int detectRLPObjectType(java.nio.ByteBuffer bb)
        Detects the object type of an RLP encoded object. Note that it does not modify the read position in the ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        bb - ByteBuffer that contains RLP encoded object
        Returns:
        object type: EthereumUtil.RLP_OBJECTTYPE_ELEMENT or EthereumUtil.RLP_OBJECTTYPE_LIST or EthereumUtil.RLP_OBJECTTYPE_INVALID

      • getRLPListSize

        public static long getRLPListSize(java.nio.ByteBuffer bb)
        Determines the size of a RLP list. Note: it does not change the position in the ByteBuffer
        Parameters:
        bb -
        Returns:
        -1 if not an RLP encoded list, otherwise size of list INCLUDING the prefix of the list (e.g. byte that indicates that it is a list and size of list in bytes) in bytes

      • calculateChainId

        public static java.lang.Long calculateChainId(EthereumTransaction eTrans)
        Calculates the chain Id
        Parameters:
        eTrans - Ethereum Transaction of which the chain id should be calculated
        Returns:
        chainId: 0, Ethereum testnet (aka Olympic); 1: Ethereum mainet (aka Frontier, Homestead, Metropolis) - also Classic (from fork) -also Expanse (alternative Ethereum implementation), 2 Morden (Ethereum testnet, now Ethereum classic testnet), 3 Ropsten public cross-client Ethereum testnet, 4: Rinkeby Geth Ethereum testnet, 42 Kovan, public Parity Ethereum testnet, 7762959 Musicoin, music blockchain

      • getTransactionHash

        public static byte[] getTransactionHash(EthereumTransaction eTrans)
        Calculates the hash of a transaction. Note this requires that you have Bouncy castle as a dependency in your project
        Parameters:
        eTrans - transaction
        Returns:
        transaction hash as KECCAK-256

      • getTransactionHashWithoutSignature

        public static byte[] getTransactionHashWithoutSignature(EthereumTransaction eTrans)
        Calculates the hash of a transaction without signature. Note this requires that you have Bouncy castle as a dependency in your project
        Parameters:
        eTrans - transaction
        Returns:
        transaction hash as KECCAK-256

      • getSendAddress

        public static byte[] getSendAddress(EthereumTransaction eTrans)
        Calculates the sent address of an EthereumTransaction. Note this can be a costly operation to calculate. . This requires that you have Bouncy castle as a dependency in your project
        Parameters:
        eTrans - transaction
        Returns:
        sent address as byte array

      • convertVarNumberToLong

        public static java.lang.Long convertVarNumberToLong(RLPElement rpe)
        Converts a variable size number (e.g. byte,short,int,long) in a RLPElement to long
        Parameters:
        rpe - RLPElement containing a number
        Returns:
        number as long or null if not a correct number

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        byte or null if not byte

      • convertToString

        public static java.lang.String convertToString(RLPElement rpe)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Converts a UTF-8 String in a RLPElement to String
        Parameters:
        rpe - RLP element containing a raw String
        Returns:
        string or null if not String
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if UTF-8 is not supported

      • convertToString

        public static java.lang.String convertToString(RLPElement rpe,
                                               java.lang.String encoding)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Converts a String in a RLPElement to String
        Parameters:
        rpe - RLP element containing a raw String
        encoding - encoding of the raw String
        Returns:
        string or null if not String
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • convertHexStringToByteArray

        public static byte[] convertHexStringToByteArray(java.lang.String hexString)
        Converts a Hex String to Byte Array. Only used for configuration not for parsing. Hex String is in format of xsd:hexBinary
        Parameters:
        hexString - String in Hex format.
        Returns:
        byte array corresponding to String in Hex format

      • convertByteArrayToHexString

        public static java.lang.String convertByteArrayToHexString(byte[] byteArray)
        Converts a Byte Array to Hex String. Only used for configuration not for parsing. Hex String is in format of xsd:hexBinary
        Parameters:
        byteArray - byte array to convert
        Returns:
        String in Hex format corresponding to byteArray

      • reverseByteArray

        public static byte[] reverseByteArray(byte[] inputByteArray)
        Reverses the order of the byte array
        Parameters:
        inputByteArray - array to be reversed
        Returns:
        inputByteArray in reversed order
